name: LD40 (LozzaDawg)
description:
Game for LD40 with the theme, "The more you have the worse it is"

In the game you control a legion of holy warriors attempting to claim land from evil demons, but the more land you take, the more demons you have to face.

PRESS 1 - To go to view mode. See the tiles and units

PRESS 2 - To go to move mode. Move your units in this mode

PRESS 3 - To go to ability mode. Use your attacks to kill enemies in this mode

VERY BAD - NEEDS FIXING IN EVERY WAY

Coding done with JavaScript in Atom.

Art done in Pyxel Edit.
